extensionDescription.message: Let your replies follow their original message!

prefs_OptionText_dest_folder_type_info.message: Choose whether to move the mails to a subfolder or the same folder.

prefs_OptionText_warn_before_run_info.message: Warn the user before running the moving operation.

prefs_OptionText_dest_folder_prefix_info.message: Specify a prefix for the subfolder name where the mails will be moved.
If left empty, the mails will be moved to the first subfolder.

prefs_OptionText_do_only_same_account_in.message: Search for related mail only in the same account.

prefs_OptionText_do_only_sent_info.message: Consider only mails that are sent by the account owner of the considered folder.

prefs_OptionText_do_only_sent_folders_in.message: Consider only folders that are marked as "Sent" type. Otherwise give a warning to the user.

prefs_OptionText_ignore_archive_folders_.message: Do not search for related mails that are in "archive" folders.

prefs_OptionText_min_moves_to_open_repor.message: Min number of mails moved to open the report tab
Set the minimum number of mails moved to automatically open the report in a new tab.

prefs_OptionText_max_messages_moved.message: Max number of mails to move

prefs_OptionText_max_messages_moved_info.message: Set the maximum number of mails to move in a single operation.

prefs_OptionText_do_debug_info.message: Turn on debug mode for additional logging.

prefsInfoDesc_1.message: This add-on moves sent emails to the same folder or a subfolder of the original message they replied to. It also works for calendar invites (at least with Outlook 365).

prefsInfoDesc_2.message: Beware of changing these options. The default values are more conservative to prevent emails from being moved to the wrong places. Change them only if you know what you are doing!

TranslateText.message: Do you want to help translate this addon?

confirm_delete_reports.message: Are you sure you want to delete all stored Reports?

Info_Tooltip.message: The numbers in order are: total messages, moved, destination folder not found, related message not found.

AutoMoveMsg.message: We are going to auto move messages from the folder

SubfolderPrefixEmptyWarn.message: The subfolder prefix is empty, are you sure to proceed?

messagesNotMoved.message: $0$ message not moved: destination folder not found

messagesNotMoved_plural.message: $0$ messages not moved: destination folder not found

thisIsNotSentFolder.message: This is not a "sent" folder! If you want to run on any folder, change the preference in the options page.

prefs_OptionText_dest_folder_ok_same_fol.message: If no destination subfolder is found, use the same folder of the related message if it starts with the correct prefix. This is useful if you reply to a your sent email.

prefs_OptionText_use_also_thread_index_i.message: This option requires more time per message, but it helps find more related messages. It works for calendar invites.

executedFromSelection.message: Executed from a selection of messages

prefs_OptionText_pause_between_messages_.message: Pause after a message has been moved (in milliseconds).

prefs_OptionText_pause_every_10_messages.message: Pause after 10 messages have been moved (in milliseconds).

ThunderbirdOffline.message: Thunderbird appears to be offline. Moving messages in bulk in IMAP accounts while offline is not recommended.

ThunderbirdGoneOffline.message: Thunderbird has gone offline. Moving messages in bulk within IMAP accounts while offline is not recommended. The operation has been stopped.

prefs_OptionText_imap_force_folder_updat.message: Force an update of the destination folder, after a message move, when using an IMAP account.
